name: specifically

specifically adverb
(FOR ONE PURPOSE)
Add to word list

C1 for a particular reason, purpose, etc.: These jeans are designed specifically for women. [ + to infinitive ] I bought it specifically to wear at the wedding. We are aiming our campaign specifically at young people.
More examplesFewer examplesThese advertisements are specifically aimed at young people.The paper is targeted specifically at young people.The stadium has been specifically designed as a venue for European Cup matches.
